What do they make

All-metal multi-blade razors

Visit Leaf Shave

Why Less Mess recommends

Leaf makes two models of all-metal razor that take 1, 2 or 3 blades, so you can replace your plastic disposable or plastic-cartridge-refillable razors with something that works in the same way. The replaceable blades are recyclable metal that you can simply mail back to the company. The initial buy is a little spendy, but it should work out cheaper in the long run if you're buying disposables already.

We're a work in progress

This site doesn't take any fees or payment for recommendations, it's simply a list of products and services we know work well for normal people who just want to make Less Mess in the world.
